text.div:
Candida species [Excluding Candida auris] (Tests by Culture and Identification Method [Excluding NAA Identification Method])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    553-8 Candida sp identified in Saliva (oral fluid) by Organism specific culture
    554-6 Candida sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    555-3 Candida sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    73962-3 Candida sp rRNA [Identifier] by FISH in Positive blood culture
    88717-4 Candida sp identified in Isolate

name: Candida species [Excluding Candida auris] (Tests by Culture and Identification Method [Excluding NAA Identification Method])
